backend/main.mo: Defines the Ribbit canister’s state, data types, maps, likes, activity tracking, tag systems, user identity linkages, and integrates blob storage and access control.
feature_evidence.json: Lists evidence for a frontend feature enabling automatic Froggy Phrase access control initialization, including affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries of key frontend files for reference in build or documentation workflows.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Explains prerequisites and steps for deploying or updating the Ribbit app on the Internet Computer.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the frontend’s root React mount and main script.
frontend/scripts/combined-update.sh: Shell script automating backend binding generation, frontend build, and canister deployment with error handling.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routes, layout, theme, and automatic Froggy Phrase generation and access-control initialization.
frontend/src/components/BookmarkButton.t: Bookmark button component that toggles bookmark state for a lily with configurable colors.
frontend/src/components/CommentItem.tsx: Renders a comment with avatar, timestamp, content, and optional like and reply actions.
frontend/src/components/EmojiReactions.t: Emoji reaction bar supporting selectable and hoverable reactions with counts.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with navigation links and attribution section using a heart icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the main site header with navigation, search handling for mobile and desktop, and user avatar actions. Manages search dropdowns, debouncing, navigation, and mobile sidebar toggle.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Defines the page layout with header, footer, outlet content, and a mobile sidebar drawer. Automatically closes the drawer on route changes.
frontend/src/components/LeftSidebar.tsx: Displays the left sidebar navigation with active-state links and recent activity items. Fetches recent activities and pond/lily data for contextual links.
frontend/src/components/LilyCard.tsx: Shows a card view for a lily post with avatar, metadata, stats, image, and actions like like, share, and bookmark. Fetches counts, pond info, and user avatar data.
frontend/src/components/LilyImageFrame.t: Displays an image with automatic aspect‑ratio detection, applying a blurred backdrop for non‑4:3 images. Wraps the image in a clickable, responsive frame.
frontend/src/components/MobileLeftSideba: Implements a slide‑in mobile sidebar drawer with a scrim overlay and body scroll lock. Renders the LeftSidebar inside a mobile-friendly drawer panel.
frontend/src/components/PondAboutSidebar: Shows detailed information about a pond including stats, moderators, visibility, and join/leave controls. Loads pond metadata and membership state, with skeletons for loading.
frontend/src/components/PondCardJoinCont: Provides a join button for a pond card with success/error toasts. Handles join interactions while preventing navigation when clicked.
frontend/src/components/PondMobileHeader: Mobile header for a pond showing banner, profile image, description, and navigation tabs for feed/about.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Displays a post preview with voting, metadata, content, image, tag, and comment/view counts.
frontend/src/components/ProfileRibbitIte: Renders a user's ribbit in their profile with avatar, timestamp, content, and link to the related post.
Emoji picker popover allowing quick emoji selection for ribbits.
frontend/src/components/RibbitItem.tsx: Displays a ribbit with nesting, likes, replies, and an expandable reply form.
frontend/src/components/RibbitMiniBlurAv: Loads an avatar with a tiny blurred placeholder that transitions to the final image once loaded.
frontend/src/components/RightSidebar.tsx: Right sidebar showing trending ponds, popular tags, and recent popular posts with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/search/MobileSea: Implements a full-screen mobile search modal showing trending searches or suggestions and handling input and selection.
frontend/src/components/search/SearchDro: Renders a dropdown under the search bar displaying trending searches or suggestions based on query state.
frontend/src/components/TagHubRightSideb: Sidebar module displaying top, trending, and newest tags with activity counts.
frontend/src/components/UnderlineTabs.ts: Provides styled wrappers for tab list and tab triggers with underline-specific classes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to user identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookmarks.ts: Manages bookmarked lily IDs with localStorage persistence and helpers to toggle, add, remove, and clear bookmarks.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebounce.ts: Returns a debounced version of a value that updates after a delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInitializeFroggyPh: Initializes Froggy Phrase access control once per session when an actor is available.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity state, login/logout functions, and identity loading via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: Tracks whether a CSS media query matches and updates on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor methods in React Query hooks for fetching and mutating ponds, lilies, users, roles, and related data.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining theme CSS variables for light and dark modes plus utility classes for UI styling.
frontend/src/lib/formatNumber.ts: Provides a helper to format large numbers into k, M, or B suffixes.
frontend/src/lib/froggyPhraseWordList.ts: Exports frog-related terms and a large general word list for generating Froggy Phrases.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Implements client‑side image validation, resizing, and compression with GIF animation detection.
frontend/src/lib/pondNameValidation.ts: Validates and normalizes pond names to strict alphanumeric format with error messaging.
frontend/src/lib/pondRank.ts: Sorts ponds by lily count, member count, and name, returning a rank map.
frontend/src/lib/shareLily.ts: Shares a lily URL using Web Share API with clipboard and fallback support.
frontend/src/lib/tagValidation.ts: Validates and normalizes alphanumeric tags and returns error messages for invalid input.
frontend/src/lib/types.ts: Defines local TypeScript interfaces for activity and tag statistics types.
frontend/src/lib/user.ts: Manages user IDs, usernames, backups, and generation/storage of 12‑word Froggy Phrases.
frontend/src/lib/viewCountCooldown.ts: Implements per‑lily view cooldown tracking via timestamps in localStorage.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Displays an About page describing the Ribbit platform, its features, and community guidelines.
frontend/src/pages/AllPondsPage.tsx: Fetches and lists all ponds with join controls, loading states, and computed ranking badges.
frontend/src/pages/CreateLilyPage.tsx: Provides a form to create a lily with text, image, or link content, including tag suggestions, validation, and image compression.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePondPage.tsx: Implements a pond creation form with name validation, description fields, and image uploads with compression and previews.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: Form for creating text, image, or link posts with validation, pond selection, optional tagging, and image compression.
frontend/src/pages/FrogProfilePage.tsx: Renders a user profile page showing avatar, stats, posts, and comments with loading and not‑found states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the home feed with trending/new sorting, search results, sidebars, and loading skeletons.
frontend/src/pages/LilyPage.tsx: Shows a single lily post with comments, likes, views, image lightbox, and view‑increment logic.
frontend/src/pages/PondAboutPage.tsx: Displays pond metadata, moderators, visibility, and join/leave actions with loading and not‑found handling.
frontend/src/pages/PondPage.tsx: Renders a pond’s feed sorted by newest, with sidebars, banner, and loading/not‑found states.
frontend/src/pages/PostPage.tsx: Displays a single post with content, image, link, metadata, and threaded comments, and allows users to submit new comments.
frontend/src/pages/SavedLiliesPage.tsx: Shows bookmarked lily posts stored locally and renders each with loading, missing, or card states plus removal support.
frontend/src/pages/TagHubPage.tsx: Lists top, trending, and newest tags with ranking and stats, switching between categories via tabs.
frontend/src/pages/TagPage.tsx: Displays lilies for a specific tag, auto-redirects to the canonical tag, and shows subcategories with sort options.
frontend/src/pages/UserSettingsPage.tsx: Provides user settings for username changes, avatar uploads, pond membership management, and admin tools.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Describes project metadata, known issues, and feature requests related to Froggy-Phrase user role initialization.
